event: admission to pediatric intensive care unit
positive stool and blood cultures for gram-negative Bacilli Escherichia coli
provisional diagnosis of acute infectious gastroenteritis with sepsis
no abnormal cells in bone marrow
thrombosis in both the left sigmoid and the transverse sinuses
positive factor XIII V34L and MTHFR A1298C homozygous mutations
heterozygous positive factor V Leiden mutation
complete recanalization of the thrombosed sinuses
no thrombotic events or leukemia relapses
